title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Strangers and friends alike reward your positive attitude with graciousness of their own. And even if some people treat you unkindly today, youre in good enough spirits not to return the slight with any ill-will. Instead, you can use the beaming trine between the energetic Leo Moon and enthusiastic Jupiter to crack open any crusty tensions that your coworkers or friends harbor with humor and inspirational words. Laughter is the best medicine when times are tough. Louis Armstrong sang, When youre smiling, the whole world smiles with you. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
